snippet: Robert Griffin III, Andrew Luck, Justin Blackmon and Mohamed Sanu will leave college and enter the N.F.L. draft.
abstract: Robert Griffin III, Andrew Luck, Justin Blackmon and Mohamed Sanu will leave college and enter the N.F.L. draft.
lead_paragraph: It's not too early to be looking ahead to the N.F.L. draft, especially if you're a promising underclassman wanting to turn pro. Baylor's junior quarterback, Robert Griffin III, the recent Heisman Trophy winner, and Stanford quarterback Andrew Luck, who has a year of eligibility remaining, lead the crop of players who have declared for the draft. Also jumping early are the Oklahoma State junior receiver Justin Blackmon and the Rutgers junior receiver Mohamed Sanu.

headline.main: College Stars Look to N.F.L. Draft

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
